title: Introducing: BLACKSMORE
content:
BLACKSMORE.

Hardly the most appealing name for a producer, especially once combined with the fairly eerie imagery. However, Thomas Blacksmore has far more depth to his music than the dark visual element would suggest. His debut EP YOUTH is seven tracks of instrumental chillwave, built around contagious hooks and carefully structured percussion. Whilst at times it may lack personality, with a fairly similar atmosphere being expressed in each track, there are moments of pure bliss, most notably the sensational DREAMS.

As indicated by BLACKSMORE, these songs are merely a collection of demos, however the potential they portray is astounding. DREAMS has the sort of dancefloor-filler riff that M83 would kill for, whilst HOLIDAYS drifts by with it’s lulling, repetitive nature. Clearly a work in progress, there’s no doubting that at times YOUTH lacks a certain charisma, however theres no denying the vast ability it displays. Check out DREAMS below, and head to BLACKSMORE’s bandcamp to stream the full release.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
